DOC.brief_title: The Effects Very Low Carbohydrate Diet Intervention Weight Control Overweight/Obese Patients China
DOC.detailed_description: 121 obese overweight patient enrol study 23 patient drop ( 43 male , 55 female , aged≥18 year , BMI≥24 kg/m2 ) outpatient clinic endocrinology metabolism department Southern Medical University Affiliated ZhuJiang Hospital . All subject randomly assign experiment group control group . The experimental group give individual instruction follow VLCD ( low carbohydrate diet ) . Energy intake restrict less 800kcal/day ( 3349kJ/d ) ( carbohydrate intake < 20g/d ) . All daily meal replace follow : cup soybean milk ( 200 mL ) boil egg breakfast ; diet nutrition bar ( 106 Kcal : 2.8 g carbohydrate , 11.2 g protein 5.6 g fat ; Nutriease Health Technology Co. , Ltd. , Hangzhou , China ) , nonstarchy vegetable ( < 200 kcal ) , 50 g protein meat ( i.e. , beef , lean pork , skin chicken , fish ) lunch dinner . Supplementation multivitamins mineral provide per day . The energy-restricted diet ( ER diet ) design traditional Chinese style initial target total energy intake 1200 kcal/d ( 5021 kJ/d ) . Subjects also encourage drink least 1.8 litre water per day , ask maintain habitual level physical activity . Compliance diet physical activity level check weekly visit .
